thread.title: NYSP: Suspects Who Shot With Pellet Gun At Kiryas Joel Residents Arrested
thread.title_full: NYSP: Suspects Who Shot With Pellet Gun At Kiryas Joel Residents Arrested

author: Mark Hirshberg
title: NYSP: Suspects Who Shot With Pellet Gun At Kiryas Joel Residents Arrested
text:
Share 
Three suspects have been arrested in connection with the shooting incidents in the village of kiryas Joel, A NYSP Official Told JP. 
As Reported, since tuesday night four Kiryas Joel Residents have been hit with a pellet in and outside of the village of kiryas Joel, On thursday Night the NEw York State Police have arrested three suspects and charges are pending. 
The Suspects Confessed to investigators and are still being interviewed at this time. 
We have three guys in our custody who are being interviewed and will most likely go in front of a judge later tonight the official said. 
Investigators will not file any hate crime charges, the Official added.
